resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107349</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107349</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207091</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">From Fantasy to Flight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von Phantasie zu Flug</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De l'imagination au vol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Do fantasy ao vôo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dalla fantasia al volo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από τη φαντασία στην πτήση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De fantasía al vuelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides photos, letters, articles, and resources for learning about the history of flight -- aircraft and balloons, Alexander Graham Bell's aerodynamic studies, the Wright brothers, Charles Lindbergh, Igor Sikorsky's helicopters, and Amelia Earhart.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Fotos, Zeichen, Artikel und Betriebsmittel 
für das Lernen über die Geschichte des Fluges -- Flugzeug und 
Ballone, Alexander Graham Bell aerodynamische Studien, die Wright 
Brüder, Charles Lindbergh, Igor Sikorskys Hubschrauber und Amelia 
Earhart zur Verfügung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des photos, des lettres, des articles, et 
des ressources pour se renseigner sur l'histoire du vol -- avion et 
ballons, études aérodynamiques d'Alexandre Graham Bell, les frères 
de Wright, Charles Lindbergh, hélicoptères d'Igor Sikorsky, 
et Amelia Earhart.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece fotos, letras, artigos, e recursos 
aprendendo sobre o history do vôo -- avião e balões, estudos 
aerodinâmicos de Alexander Graham Bell, os irmãos de Wright, Charles
Lindbergh, helicópteros de Igor Sikorsky, e Amelia Earhart.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le foto, le lettere, gli articoli e le 
risorse per imparare circa la storia del volo -- velivolo ed 
aerostati, studi aerodinamici del Alexander Graham Bell, i fratelli di
Wright, Charles Lindbergh, elicotteri di Igor Sikorsky ed Amelia 
Earhart.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τις φωτογραφίες, τις επιστολές, τα άρθρα, και 
τα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για την εκμάθηση για την ιστορία της 
πτήσης -- αεροσκάφη και μπαλόνια, αεροδυναμικές μελέτες του 
Αλεξάνδρου Graham Bell's, οι αδελφοί Wright, ο Charles 
Lindbergh, ελικόπτερα του Igor Sikorsky's, και η Amelia 
Earhart.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a las fotos, a las cartas, a los 
artículos, y a los recursos para aprender sobre la historia del vuelo
-- avión y los globos, los estudios aerodinámicos de Alexander 
Graham Bell, los hermanos de Wright, Charles Lindbergh, helicópteros 
de Igor Sikorsky, y Amelia Earhart.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207091</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107349</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/from-fantasy-to-flight</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
